english.segment1: I know my heart is Yours. I know my world is your hands. I know my destiny. I know with You is where I stand
english.segment2: My life is not my own. The price was paid by. You alone
english.segment3: CHORUS. I forever praise you. I forever hold you high. I forever love Your name, Jesus. I forever trust You. I forever give my life. I forever love Your name, Jesus
english.segment4: I know my past is gone. I know my sin is washed away. I know my purpose now. I know IÂ’m here to live my praise
english.segment5: My life is not my own. My heart belongs to. You alone.
